00022 ** Definition of the Constructor and Destructor

00024 clSurfaceGridFrame::clSurfaceGridFrame(wxAuiNotebook *parent, const wxString& title, const wxPoint& pos, const wxSize& size, const long style, clSurfaceGrid *surfGrid):
00025                            wxPanel(parent, wxID_ANY, pos, size, style, title)
00026 {
00027   canvas               = NULL;
00028   surfaceGrid          = surfGrid;
00029   parentFrame          = parent;
00030   highLightObjectType  = hlNone;
00031   SetUpCanvas();
00032 }

00039 //  if(surfaceGrid) delete surfaceGrid;
00040 //  if(highLightObjects) delete highLightObjects;

00043 void clSurfaceGridFrame::SetUpCanvas(void)
00044 {
00045   try
00046   {
00047     GLfloat xMin = (GLfloat)(-20);
00048     GLfloat xMax = (GLfloat)(20);
00049     GLfloat yMin = (GLfloat)(-20);
00050     GLfloat yMax = (GLfloat)(20);
00051     GLfloat zMin = (GLfloat)(-20);
00052     GLfloat zMax = (GLfloat)(20);
00053 
00054     tpArray<GLfloat> *vertexArray    = new tpArray<GLfloat>;
00055     tpArray<int>     *highLightArray = new tpArray<int>;
00056     BuildVertexArray(vertexArray, highLightArray);
00057 
00058     /*
00059     ** Initialise the canvas
00060     */
00061     wxBoxSizer* sizer;
00062     sizer = new wxBoxSizer( wxHORIZONTAL );
00063 
00064     canvas = new clCanvas(this, wxID_ANY, wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize, wxDEFAULT_FRAME_STYLE, "clCanvas", dsWireFrame, GL_TRIANGLES);
00065     sizer->Add( canvas, 1, wxEXPAND | wxALL, 5 );
00066     SetSizer(sizer);
00067 
00068     canvas->SetMaxima(xMin, xMax, yMin, yMax, zMin, zMax);
00069     canvas->SetRotations(-30.0f, 30.0f, 0.0f);
00070     canvas->SetTranslations( -0.5*(xMin+xMax), -0.5*(yMin+yMax), -0.5*(zMin+zMax));
00071     canvas->SetScaleFactor(1.0f);
00072     canvas->SetVertices(vertexArray, highLightArray);
00073 
00074     Show();
00075   }
00076 
00077   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00078   {
00079     EX.AddMethodToTree("clSurfaceGridFrame::SetUpCanvas");
00080     throw(EX);
00081   }
00082 }
00083 
00084 /*
00085 ** Methods for drawing
00086 */
00087 void clSurfaceGridFrame::BuildVertexArray(tpArray<GLfloat> *vertexArray, tpArray<int> *highLightArray) const
00088 {
00089   try
00090   {
00091     if(!surfaceGrid)
00092     {
00093       clException("clSurfaceGridFrame", "BuildVertexArray", "SurfaceGrid not initialised.");
00094     }
00095     else
00096     {
00097       int numVertices = 0;
00098 
00099       // For each triangle in the surfaceGrid
00100       int numberElements = surfaceGrid->GetNumberElements();
00101       for(int theElementIndex=0; theElementIndex<numberElements; theElementIndex++)
00102       {
00103         clTriangle *theElement = surfaceGrid->GetElementPointer(theElementIndex);
00104 
00105         // For each node in the element
00106         int numberNodes = theElement->GetNumberNodes();
00107         for(int theNodeIndex=0; theNodeIndex<numberNodes; theNodeIndex++)
00108         {
00109           int       theNodeID    = theElement->GetNodeID(theNodeIndex);
00110           int       theNodeEntry = surfaceGrid->GetNodeIndex(theNodeID);
00111           clNode3D *theNode      = surfaceGrid->GetNodePointer(theNodeEntry);
00112 
00113           // Retrieve the node from the surfaceGrid
00114           vertexArray->AddItem(theNode->x());
00115           vertexArray->AddItem(theNode->y());
00116           vertexArray->AddItem(theNode->z());
00117 
00118           // Set highlighting
00119           switch(highLightObjectType)
00120           {
00121             case hlElement:
00122               if(theElementIndex == highLightObjects[0])
00123                 highLightArray->AddItem(numVertices);
00124               break;
00125 
00126             case hlFace:
00127               //TODO: Add hlFace action
00128               break;
00129 
00130             case hlNode:
00131               //TODO: Add hlNode action
00132               break;
00133 
00134             case hlNone:
00135               //TODO: Add hlNone action
00136               break;
00137           }
00138 
00139           numVertices++;
00140         }
00141       }
00142     }
00143   }
00144 
00145   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00146   {
00147     EX.AddMethodToTree("clSurfaceGridFrame::BuildVertexArray");
00148     throw(EX);
00149   }
00150 }
00151 
00152 void clSurfaceGridFrame::RedrawCanvas(void)
00153 {
00154   try
00155   {
00156     tpArray<GLfloat> *vertexArray    = new tpArray<GLfloat>;
00157     tpArray<int>     *highLightArray = new tpArray<int>;
00158     BuildVertexArray(vertexArray, highLightArray);
00159 
00160     canvas->SetVertices(vertexArray, highLightArray);
00161     canvas->Refresh();
00162   }
00163 
00164   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00165   {
00166     EX.AddMethodToTree("clSurfaceGridFrame::RedrawCanvas");
00167     throw(EX);
00168   }
00169 }

00171 void clSurfaceGridFrame::SetHighLight(enHighLight theHighlightedObject, int *theObjectEntries)
00172 {
00173   try
00174   {
00175     highLightObjectType = theHighlightedObject;
00176     highLightObjects    = theObjectEntries;

00194 void clSurfaceGridFrame::OnActivate(wxActivateEvent& event)
00195 {
00196   if (event.GetActive() && canvas)
00197   {
00198     canvas->SetCurrent();
00199   }
